document.docAuthor: Kruse, James J. & Powell, Jerry A.
document.masterDocTitle: Systematics of Sparganothoides Lambert and Powell, 1986 (Lepidoptera: Tortricidae: Sparganothini)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Systematics of Sparganothoides Lambert and Powell, 1986 (Lepidoptera: Tortricidae: Sparganothini)

keyLead.keyStep:
5 Scaling on thorax unmodified; two exoskeletal protuberances on head
..................................................... S. prolesana

paragraph.keyLead:
- Scaling on thorax modified mesally; three exoskeletal protuberances on head
........................................... S. torusana

7 Three protuberances on head ( Fig.1 ); socius/gnathos arm expanded apically
.................................... S. polymitariana

- Two protuberances on head; socius/gnathos arm narrowed apically
.......................................................... S. cornutana

10 Sclerotized crease of valva gently curved or nearly straight
....................................................................... S. licrosana

- Sclerotized crease of valva strongly curved or U-shape
............................................................................. S. arcuatana

12 Apex of uncus bulbous with two minute projections
.............................................................................. S. capitiornata

- Apex of uncus expanded and with a single subrectangular projection
..................................................... S. canorisana

14 Exoskeletal protuberances on head reduced [visible only if head is denuded of vertex scales]; thoracic scaling unmodified
................................................................................................................................................. S. xenopsana

- Exoskeletal protuberances on head prominent; thoracic scaling modified
................................................. S. umbosana

15 Posterior margin of transtilla weakly bilobed; aedeagus with a ventral lip apically
.................................... S. ocrisana

- Posterior margin of transtilla strongly bilobed; aedeagus attenuate, unmodified apically
.................... S. probolosana

22 Forewing brown and dark brown with a distinct light brown basal fascia
............................................. S. carycrosana

- Forewing light brown and gray without a distinct light brown basal fascia
.......................................... S. plemmelana

23 Apex of uncus clubbed; apex of socius/gnathos arm unilobed
..................................................................... S. teratana

- Apex of uncus with two lateral subapical lobes; apex of socius/gnathos arm bilobed
.................................... S. lugens
24 Anterior margin of sacculus distinctly concave, extending to apex of valva or beyond ............................................ 25
- Anterior margin of sacculus straight or gently curved, ending well short of apical margin of valva........................ 26

25 Valva with sclerotized crease; saccular lobe not projecting beyond valva
.................................................. S. vinolenta

- Valva without sclerotized crease; saccular lobe projecting well beyond valva
............................................ S. castanea
- Apex of socius/gnathos arm a symmetrical or slightly asymmetrical club................................................................. 31

29 Posterior margin of transtilla distinctly bilobed; forewing yellow and brown
......................................... S. audentiana
- Posterior margin of transtilla slightly bilobed, forewing grayish brown or gray........................................................ 30

31 Posterior margin of transtilla bilobed; aedeagus about as long as phallobase
............................................... S. amitana
- Posterior margin of transtilla straight or slightly bilobed; aedeagus shorter than phallobase .................................... 32

keyLead.keyStep:
32 Transtilla straight; forewing dark grayish brown, smokey in overall appearance
.................................... S. coloratana
- Transtilla straight or slightly bilobed; forewing yellowing borwn, golden yellow, or light gray
........... S. machimiana
